content.text: Hi, I'm trying to find a new job. What are you up to?
I'm headed to a BBQ. Do you like sports?
I enjoy playing sports but watching them is not my thing.
I'm not a sports fan either. I like to drive. What is your favorite place to travel to?
I have been to Ireland and Australia. I love to visit new places.
I would love to see Ireland. I have ink stains on all my shirts because of my passion for explosions.
That's a cool hobby. I need to learn to take responsibility for my own actions and stop blaming others.
I like your honesty. What do you do for work?
I'm a successful entrepreneur who has enough money to indulge my love of animals.
That's awesome. I like animals too. I work in a coffee shop and my favorite thing about the job is the free cupcakes
